content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1587661254552{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(https://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/bigstock-Golden-Gate-Bridge-And-Fort-Po-2620812.jpg?id=5156) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Resource Center

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1536951581000{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Whether you’re a business, job seeker, or somewhere in between, we’ve got the insights for you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7084″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

EEOC Interview Guide

 

Make effective hiring decisions without probing too deep. 

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7055″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

2024 Pharmaceutical Industry Insight Guide 

 

Align your hiring strategy or career path with pharma industry trends.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6912″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

2023 Hiring & Salary Trend Guide: Finance

 

ATR’s 2023 Hiring & Salary Trend Guide: Finance shows you the roles you should hire for—including projected salaries—to capitalize on financial industry trends.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6901″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

2023 High-Tech Market Insight Guide

 

What are the latest tech trends, and how do those impact your hiring plans? Download our free High-Tech Market Insight Guide to get these answers and more!

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6052″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

A Step-By-Step Guide to a Stellar RFP

 

RFP: three little letters that can strike fear and loathing into many. But it doesn’t have to be this way! This guide provides advice and information on how to approach the project as a whole, highlighting some key steps you don’t want to skip and pointing you in the direction of other resources.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”5879″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

6 Things You Can Do To Dramatically Increase IT Contractor Retention

 

Nearly 3 out of 4 IT Managers say contractor retention is a major issue. Is a tenure policy a good idea? What really motivates your IT workers? Do benefits matter? We share some best practices to help you retain your IT contingent workforce and avoid the pitfalls and consequences of IT contractor turnover.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”5919″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

7 Expert Tips for Hiring the Best IT Employees


IT employees are an important part of almost every company. But finding the best IT candidates can be a challenge. Download our complimentary eBook to learn things like the secret interviewing techniques used by tech giants, the best way to screen for attitude, and the one thing you must have for candidates to accept a lower salary.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”5916″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

6 Best Practices for Selecting Excellent Staffing Suppliers


ATR International CEO Jerry Brenholz shares six best practices to help you select the best staffing providers for your program. Learn who to include on the selection team, what to use as selection criteria, and why meeting in person is so important. Avoid the pitfalls of your competitors and optimize your supplier base today.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”5980″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

9 Must-Ask Questions for a Perfect IT Contractor Hire


Learn the nine questions you must ask yourself to ensure you find the best IT contractors for your organization. Discover how to find the perfect IT staffing firm for your needs, what is more important than experience when it comes to interviewing, and what an IT staffing firm can help you with that you never thought of.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”5985″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

Improving Your Supplier Diversity Program

A healthy supplier diversity program can become instrumental in fostering a sustainable enterprise for years to come. Whether you’re seeking to improve or begin your supplier diversity program, there are seven important best practices to implement right away.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”blue”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”5960″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

The Essential Guide for a Successful Contingent Workforce Program


In this eBook our VP of Recruiting Wendy Sun consolidates her 22 years of contingent workforce knowledge regarding best practices for a successful program. Highlights include the nine necessities for program success, how to safeguard your program, and the best vendor mix. With the right knowledge and right approach, your program can thrive.

 

Get My Copy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Looking for more insights? Head over to our blog.

Check Out Our Blog

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Latest news and activity

How Can AI Drive Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in the Recruitment Process?

02.29.2024 | Artificial Intelligence, Diversity

Can AI-powered recruiting tools transform your workforce? While only 25% of organizations use artificial intelligence for HR-related activities, mainly to save time and money, this revolutionary technology can serve an even greater purpose—beyond generating job descriptions and streamlining workflows.  AI has the power to diversify your candidate base and drive unbiased decision-making throughout the hiring […]

Read the Article

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • ATR understands the high standards we require and their thorough screening process, large network, and experienced recruiters are able to consistently find the people we need.

     

    -ATR Client

  • When I need staffing services, I call ATR. They never fail to deliver results. They are reliable, professional, ethical, and know their business well.

     

    – ATR Client

  • We have found ATR to be a great business partner. They are professional, knowledgeable, honest, and hardworking. They demonstrate their commitment to quality and great client service every day in large and small ways. 

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row]
